transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan ji sir.
Executive: Call disconnect ho gaya tha. To abhi sir ko kya karna hai sir baat kar sakte hai ki short hua ya [inaudible] kya hai do gaadi aur hai.
Customer: Chala hai.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan madam ji.
Executive: Haan sir main vahi puch rahi thi ki ab kaise aage ka usko karna hai matlab ya to aap unki saman denge kaise denge agar wo lene ke liye nahi aaye agar unka saman aapke paas mein itna sara rakha hai to unko lene aa jana chahiye tha.
Customer: Main to vahi bol raha hu madam aap aaj wo unko maine bola ki bhaiya aap aa jao aapka saman mere paas rakha hua hai godam kiraya de do aur le jao aapka maal.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Hai na to bhaiya to kuch bol hi nahi rahe hai. Hum bole hum to FIR kar diye hai aisa hai vaisa hai maine bola thik hai bhai.
Executive: To usse aage koi action nahi hua?
Customer: Hain? Aage koi action nahi hua unka unpe?
Customer: Ab madam dekho unhone FIR kiya hai ab wo wo jo banda bewakoof banaya hai maan ke chalo jisne wo wo GST number hum dono ka hi dal diya hoga aur apna bhi agar diya hoga maan ke chalo jiska wo GST number de raha hai ho sakta hai wo uska bhi na ho wo kisi aur third person ka ho.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Aisa bhi to ho sakta hai na madam.
Executive: Haan ye bhi ho sakta hai.
Customer: Haan kyunki ab aise mein maan ke chalo usko haan usko pata hi nahi hoga jiska GST number usne diya hai ki bhai main company ka malik bol raha hu uska usne diye diya hoga aur wo uska bhi na ho kisi aur ka ho fir kya karenge fir kisko pakdega police wala tab tak to aise mein uska maal sad jayega barbad ho jayega fir wo fir main bhi barbad ho jaunga madam uska 5 lakh ka maal leke.
Executive: 5 lakh ka maal hai.
Customer: Hmm. Aur aapka kitna paisa fasa hua hai?
Customer: Mera 80000 rupya bhada tha madam Bhilai se Shimla 1600 kilometer ka range tha usme lead tha 1600 kilometer ka.
Executive: Thik hai to wo buyer ne to complaint nahi kiya hai aapke liye?
Customer: Haan kar diya hai mera bilti lagaya madam GST bhi lagaya ghar pura ghar mein mera pura kya bolte hai hamara pura property kisne wo hai madam.
Executive: Kisne bola hai?
Customer: Kya cheez? Kisne bola hai?
Customer: Kya kisne bola hai madam? Ki property khichne ke liye.
Customer: Are matlab jo maine GST number liya hai na uske accordingly ab yahan pe.
Executive: Haan. Yahan pe.
Customer: Haan mere me upar FIR hua hai main to aise dub jaunga madam.
Executive: Yahan pe jo complaint raise hui hai wo Aamir Khan ke naam se hui hai aur jo customer call se jo buyer hai.
Customer: Haan. Aamir jo.
Executive: Jo Aamir Khan hai na madam.
Executive: Haan. Uska naam usne mujhe mail kiya tha Mahindra Bhardwaj ke naam se.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Uska Mahindra wale ka maine screenshot bhi bheja tha ab uska jo bilti vilti hai usko bhejne ke liye mere ko kam se kam saat se aath bar phone aa gaye hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Batao ab iska kaun authority lega kaun kya karega bhaiya police wala aayega to to mere ko hi pakdega.
Executive: Yahi to cheez hai na ab jo bhi tha ya to usse baat ho sake ya fir aisa koi source ho jiski through usse baat kari ja sakti ho.
Customer: Ab dekho wo ab suno na madam dekho wo maan ke chalo us company wale ne koi dusre party se baat kiya tha hai na us party wale ne mere se baat kiya tha.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Hmm. Nahi sir ye ye ye possibility ho nahi sakti hai kyunki already matlab ek aati hi company to nahi chal rahi hai yaani ki koi na koi aisa hai jo janta hai ya to aapki company se ya to unki company se hai na to koi na koi aisa to hai jo janta hai sari cheeze.
Customer: Haan ab main kya batau mere ko kya bolu samajh hi nahi aaya.
Executive: Koi baat nahi usme legal team to already kaam kar hi legi aap mujhe ek bari unka naam bata sakte ho company ka naam ek bari vapas se batana jo aap bata rahe ho jinke jinka maal aapke paas mein rakha hua hai.
Customer: Unka Gauri ek minute na main dekhta hu smart phone pe lead hai mere paas.
Executive: Haan dekh ke batana number ho agar ya fir GST number GST number hoga aapke paas GST number batana.
Customer: Ek minute ek minute madam dekho jo unka jo wo supplier hai na verified supplier hai wo bhi main bhi verified supplier hu mera bhi subscription.
Executive: Supplier nahi hai market.
Customer: Haan ye dekho wo ye hai inka Gauri Pratap Shankar.
Executive: Gauri Pratap.
Executive: Aap mujhe GST number do aise to bahut sari company aa rahi hai.
Customer: Ek minute ruko na madam main nikal ke de raha hu mobile hang mar raha hai.
Executive: Hmm hmm koi issue nahi hai main line pe hi hu aapke paas.
Customer: Ye madam data off ho gaya na isiliye nahi chal pa raha hai wo ek minute cut karenge kya?
Executive: Haan haan bilkul aap kat ke GST number mujhe whatsapp pe bhejna.
Customer: Aapne whatsapp pe mujhe whatsapp kiya tha kya madam mera wo kya number dalte wo aap hi ka number hai kya madam?
Executive: Haan haan mera number hai.
Customer: To usme maine madam question mark dala tha aapne kuch bola hi nahi.
Executive: Nahi question mark dala hi nahi hai aapne mere paas mein to aapne last mein jab meri baat hui thi aapse tabhi ki baat chit padi hui thi dekhiyega maine abhi aapko hi bheja hua hai.
Customer: Ek minute madam ye to pehle phone to kat dijiye isme to aa hi nahi raha hai kuch band ho gaya sara.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's goods are stuck with the transporter.

- Transporter's money is also stuck.

- FIR has been filed in customer's name.



Resolution:

- Executive listened to the customer's issue.

- Executive asked for the GST number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share GST number on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- gst, fir, transporter, complaint
